text:
The humans are home,
They don't ever go outside,
June loves quarantine

Fridge is opening,
Silly humans look away,
Lunchables bandit

Pulling on my leash,
To meet my newest best friend,
Every single dog

Sit, down, paw, leave, stay,
If I try them all at once,
Guaranteed a treat

It is a new day,
Wake up, yawn, and downward dog,
Humans say BIG STRETCH
